website_summaries.verdict: Eye-catching glass on top of solid wood gives this handsome table a look to fit your contemporary home.
pros: Great combination of attractive beechwood with a glass top in a rectangular design
Glass is tempered and has a solid feel
cons: Several customers complained that their tables arrived broken

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about buying this online but it was only around $150 with free shipping so I took a chance. I’m really happy with it. The base is actual wood, not some crappy wood substitute, and the top is quite heavy and solid. After screwing the pieces tightly, it doesn’t wobble at all. My mom came over and asked where I got it and she was very surprised that it was so cheap. Other reviewers said you NEED two people to assemble, but I’m a regular lady and I managed by myself. So don’t be intimidated at the thought that it’s extremely heavy or complicated.
customer_reviews.author: MReview

customer_reviews.title: Pictures don't do it justice...
customer_reviews.text: This table is beautiful. The legs are real wood, the glass is heavy. Knowing what I know now I would have easily paid twice this price for it.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla B

customer_reviews.title: Versatile...consider this as a "modern" desk
customer_reviews.text: After 37 years of practicing law behind a 6.5 foot mahogany behmoth, I trashed it and the standard overstuffed executive chair. I got this bad boy, a 60's style lamp (with LEDs) and a chair that looks like Roccoro. What a difference this made to the office. I can do a few more years before pulling the plug. I know it's a dining room table...really smaller...a dinette. Amazon's inexpensive 4 drawer cabinet makes a perfect combination. Total $380, including computer table in "L" configuration - it's whole new office. Going to work is fun again.
customer_reviews.author: RouseOKC

customer_reviews.title: Nice table. Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I like the height of this table. Our cushioned chairs made our old table feel too high. I also like having a glass top it makes clean up a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Jernabean

customer_reviews.title: Most bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful table, arrived nicely packaged - well protected. Great price, the most bang for your buck. Also, it seems really sturdy. I’m really impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: A great table
customer_reviews.text: I use this table as my desk daily. It was easy to put together. It is classic and simple. I love it. It works for putting together puzzles and drawing or coloring so I don’t have lines on my creations. I also use it for my big projects so I have space to spread stuff out. It would be a great dining table. I’m so glad mine came without a single nick or break at all! Even though the box was heavily damaged, the table was fine. Whew!
customer_reviews.author: BraveOne

customer_reviews.title: Just beautiful and so easy to put together!
customer_reviews.text: Wow - just amazing and so beautiful! I’m using as my office desk. Great space. I’m a single female and the package was not too heavy. Took me 15 minutes to put together. When you lay the glass on top be careful. I put a small scratch in the piece yet it buffed out with a touch of varnish.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, the glass is very heavy and the wooden legs look great. Very expensive look for any dining space, it could even works great as a desk or office table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Timeless Table!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Worth every penny! Has that West Elm look at a cheaper price. Perfect for my small spaced condo! So happy with my purchase. Easy to put together - able to do alone. The glass top is secured by screws underneath, so no glass top shifting will occur. The walnut finish is great too. Looks very high end. You will not be disappointed people!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dean

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous! I was very skeptical at first, but so glad I went with this table. The legs are real wood and match the legs on my couch and coffee table perfectly. The table was super simple to put together. For the cost, I was super pleased with the quality of the glass and legs. I think for larger rooms it could serve as a modern desk, but I'm using mine as a dining table in my apartment and it's perfect. One note - while putting it together is super easy, I'd recommend having someone help with the glass - once it's out of the box it's decently heavy!
customer_reviews.author: aberforth

customer_reviews.title: Great, modern, elegant desk
customer_reviews.text: This desk exceeded my expectations. Per reviews from other users, I was already convinced but had my doubts about how good they say it was. The desk is sturdy and well designed. Simple but modern looking. I'm using it for my home office and I could fit what I need. Assemble was a breeze, it comes with the tools and perfectly marked for where you need to attach the feet to the glass top. I used my electric drill just to finish quicker but that was me. 5-Stars.
customer_reviews.author: Polo

customer_reviews.title: Misleading reviews.
customer_reviews.text: So i received the table opened the box only to see different color pieces. I ordered the espresso color yet I received a mix of the walnut and one piece expresso colored. Wtf??
customer_reviews.author: Katt

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Easy for me to assemble myself. Took maybe half an hour. Heavy glass top that is definitely a two person life job. Incredibly sturdy (even around kids!) since the glass and wood base screw together, unlike many tables where the glass simply sets atop the base. Table can easily match with elegant upholstered chairs, or laid back mod chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Shattered glass
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the table, when I received it, it was shattered to pieces, seller willing to replace glass, however, while responsive, it felt like things were dragging a little and I just wanted to get things done immediately. So I ended up returning the table.
customer_reviews.author: marchio

customer_reviews.title: Even With The Price Increase.....
customer_reviews.text: .... it's an excellent buy. Good looking, well made, stable, easy assembly (with two people). The only negative is the pointed corners that should have been a radius. .
customer_reviews.author: Fred Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Best table ever
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe that this table was the price it is. This looks like it was about 500 or 600 from West Elm. It’s so pretty and easy to assemble. It’s sturdy and looks amazing in my dining room. Whoever gets in on this little secret is so beyond lucky. Mid century adorable.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Why did they do this?
customer_reviews.text: Arrived Shattered. In pieces. Did they send me another shattered return? The packaging implies that they wanted it to shatter! I’ll give them the benefit of the doubt. Maybe they didn’t know they were sending out glass through trucks and loaders who don’t have time to baby the product? Or they just don’t care...
customer_reviews.author: Telljules08

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed with this table!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for the perfect glass table to compliment my chairs when I saw this. Instantly fell in love with the look of it, but was nervous about the quality since it was only $200. Ordered it anyway and let me tell you... It came fast, only took a few days, and even though the box it came in was falling apart, all the pieces were there. It took me maybe 30 minutes to put together. The hardest part was lifting the glass top by myself. It's heavy!! But all the pieces are good quality and I'm very excited to continue using this dining table. Love, love, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble - have gotten many compliments on the table!
customer_reviews.author: E. Rapp

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, parts don’t fit correctly
customer_reviews.text: At first the table was great but a month later and the screws fell out one by one.. I came home and one side of the table was completely collapsed. Very scary since it’s glass and almost shattered
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Measurement is misleading, short distance between legs
customer_reviews.text: If your chairs are wide, do not buy it, the legs are not close to the edge of the table and the chairs do not fit through the wide part and even one chair does not fit through the sides, it is a pity because the table is beautiful and robust . Despite being a 60-inch table, it does not work as such.
customer_reviews.author: J.L.

customer_reviews.title: Great table at a great value
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. For the price, I am super happy. I returned a different table set because it was flimsy. This table is not flimsy and looks great. Will go with so many decor choices. Love the size of the table as I was dealing with a tight space.
customer_reviews.author: A.U.

customer_reviews.title: Super High Quality, great table
customer_reviews.text: This table is absolutely beautiful! Its solid, and I definitely would have paid double for it. It looks great and can actually seat 6 people comfortably. It was incredibly easy to put together and I only needed my dad's help to life the table once the glass was attached ( The glass was a bit heavy for me to life on my own). I would 100% buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality.  Glass edges are sharp
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. Glass edges are sharp and pointy though if you have kids.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous but there was a chip on the glass.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a gorgeous table, exactly as described. Unfortunately, it wasn’t properly protected, the box arrived broken and there was a chip on one of the corners of the glass. I hope the seller improves protection to avoid losing sales on this table. Otherwise it is a beautiful table.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Blanco

customer_reviews.title: Relax, it made it safely through shopping. Great table!!
customer_reviews.text: When the box came late and busted up I thought I’d find the table in pieces. Nope. The table is perfect and put together perfectly with no issues. I use it as a desk in my apartment and even with a 32 inch monitor and MacBook pro there is a lot of room! Now I want one for my office at work.
customer_reviews.author: tonyg38

customer_reviews.title: Very great table!
customer_reviews.text: I love this table! It looks so elegant and chic! The glass is pretty heavy but the wooden legs support it pretty good. It’s very sturdy for me. I got the espresso color and it’s so pretty. When the box arrived it was a little beat up, but everything inside was untouched bc it was wrapped up very good. This is a very nice table and worth the money. It was very easy to assemble as well only took about 30 min.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Good looking table; great customer service in return!
customer_reviews.text: Table top was damaged initially but seller replaced it and was very responsive. Looks great. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This table is so nice. It's three times the price anywhere else
customer_reviews.text: This table is so nice. It's three times the price anywhere else... believe me I've searched. Came early and easy to assemble. ... two person job for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Meccaronie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and nice
customer_reviews.text: The glass is great quality the legs are good sturdy but slides easily. I have children and they have yet to ruin it and it’s been months cleans up great!
customer_reviews.author: DiannC

customer_reviews.title: Great table, great deal
customer_reviews.text: Great table, well made, looks stylish and more expensive than it is. We have a small space and it’s great to have a piece of functional furniture that doesn’t make the room feel claustrophobic. It’s also very sturdy and sits evenly on the floor. The only thing is that it gets smudgy easily, but that’s just the nature of a glass table. Overall very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Risse

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful table
customer_reviews.text: Table arrived sooner that I expected! It's a "beautiful" table but the top glass is all in pieces!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Conchacha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It’s absolutely beautiful! I’m redoing my bedroom into a mid century modern style and this desk is perfect! It’s sturdy, arrived in perfect condition, and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Rushing

customer_reviews.title: I Love this Table
customer_reviews.text: I love this table. Easy to assemble. Everyone that have seen the table love the mid-century look. The chairs was not included. If I can make one recommendation, I wish the table top was 6" longer. I think it would comfortably fit 6 people if it was that size.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy J Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great looking table.
customer_reviews.text: I love the style. It is a beautiful table and assemblage is a breezy. I only needed an extra pair of hands to help me with the glass top. The only problem is that it still shakes a bit more than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Renata

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great table for the price! Super sturdy and easy to put together. I have gotten lots of compliments on it!
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Amazing table
customer_reviews.text: We needed a small table for our new apartment. After searching everywhere for something nice and affordable we found this table and bought it because all the good reviews, but we still were a little worried about the quality... no need to worry, this table is amazing. It's super easy to assemble, it seats four people comfortably and looks beautiful in person. Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.author: Florencia Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Great table to use as a desk
customer_reviews.text: I got the table to use as a desk since it was a great dupe for a west elm desk that was way more expensive and would have required me to stain the wood base to get the dark color I wanted. The packaging was great as even though the outside box arrived damaged, everything including the glass type was still in tact. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Porche Wood

customer_reviews.title: Buy it you won’t regret it
customer_reviews.text: Love this table I have been looking for a glass dinning table and this one is perfect. Buy it you won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Excellent table for the price; packaging could be better
customer_reviews.text: A pretty good table for the price! My only qualm is the corner of the table was damaged and my hand got cut opening the product.
customer_reviews.author: Lt. Flash

customer_reviews.title: Good looking table.
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars is because one leg was loose and found out that it was not glued properly. I had to re-glue it and will see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: David J.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great table. Glass and wood. Very elegant yet simple. But the packaging needs improvement. All this thin styrofoam is bad and protects nothing. I have a chip on the edge of the glass. I turned that part of the table to the wall. If it didn’t have that, would have been 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: JcOnline

customer_reviews.title: Modern and elegant.
customer_reviews.text: The first delivery the whole glass was broken to pieces. The company sent me another one and I’m very pleased. Looking forward to easy cleanup. It’s very modern. Perfect for our two-bedroom apartment. Looks elegant and made our dining area a lot nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Schwarz

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this purchase! It’s minimalist and classic. Very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: MeowMy

customer_reviews.title: Low budget
customer_reviews.text: Nice look, quality is not the greatest. Good for low budget.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, compact dining table
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy lovely table. I was able to put together fairly quickly with a little help picking up the glass. A+ and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Krystle Ford

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful affordable sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love the simplicity of the table. I have chairs that my husband recieved from his grandmother and I wanted to be able to show them more. We have an apartment and it makes the dining room seem even larger even though it's a 4 person table. It's a wonderful affordable piece that we eat at everyday.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: its beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I bought few tables from Amazon for the last month, I returned many of them because of shipping damages. This one made in full and I am very please from it. Give it a shot you will not regret. 6 people max.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID & MARCO

customer_reviews.title: Looks expensive, excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this smaller dining table perfect for a 2nd home in the city (an apartment) but the color of the stain online matched our existing chairs perfectly. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: S. J. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and looks beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Wish the space between the legs were a little bit more as my chairs are just a bit tight. Besides that the table is beautiful and looks very elegant in space .
customer_reviews.author: Mbrad

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and modern
customer_reviews.text: This table was everything I was looking for and so much more. One of my favorite parts of our kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Jasmyne Martinez

customer_reviews.title: looks great
customer_reviews.text: this is a really good option for and small space, looks rich and modern, de only issue that I have its the glass come with two small scratches but if you don't put attention you can't see it, a fast delivery and well packed
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing deal!!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design, looks great, sturdy and easy to put together!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: The table was great but it has a damage everywhere!
customer_reviews.text: It is actually a beautiful table but it has a damage when I open the box and I’m disappointed the way it is packed and handed on the way.
customer_reviews.author: Elnatan B

customer_reviews.title: Loveeeeeee!
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this table. Took me hardly any time to assemble, the table is very sturdy and I love the look. Excellent value!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon F.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match for vintage chairs
customer_reviews.text: I had a set of vintage MCM chairs that I was trying to match without spending too much - and this table works perfect. Took less than 5 minutes to assemble and I love that the glass attaches to the base for extra security.
customer_reviews.author: SomeUserNameHere

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my table! It was extremely easy to assemble, which took about 30 minutes to complete. It has a simple and modern look that completes my dinning room.
customer_reviews.author: lydia dehoyos

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this beautiful table
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful table and very easy to assemble. Great quality for the price! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: As a desk 10/10
customer_reviews.text: Love it ok It the size the glass is so perfect for everything I needed the nets are awesome the table fits perfectly as my new desk
customer_reviews.author: Tanner M.

customer_reviews.title: Cute table!
customer_reviews.text: Nice small table. Took under 10 min to assemble, love the dark wood look.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Glass top came in shattered
customer_reviews.text: Started unboxing. Everything else was fine except for the glass, which the entire piece was shattered.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I’m so in love with this table, so easy to assemble 👍
customer_reviews.author: Dica

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: It'll work for my purpose. Compared to what I almost bought from West Elm. It's good.
customer_reviews.author: Dolo Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just as described, fast shipper. Will order from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Jenell Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this table, very sturdy and beautiful and for the price omg its worth it ...the legs are wood but I spray painted mine to go with my decor... BEAUTIFUL!
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Nice table
customer_reviews.text: Nice, contemporary table. It’s perfect for my kitchen. Arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: maddie

customer_reviews.title: high quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this fable. Feels really modern and high quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It fits any style
customer_reviews.text: This table looks small but it's a perfect size. We added an additional chair and it fits 5 very comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Pelayo

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous table
customer_reviews.text: Table is beautiful, but the Styrofoam i.e. polystyrene packaging it came in will go in the landfill and stay there for 500 years. I wish there was a kind of packaging that Amazon could come up with that would break down and not pollute our environment.
customer_reviews.author: Joanicole

customer_reviews.title: Glass chip
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and looks sturdy. Unfortunately the glass has a chip at the edge.
customer_reviews.author: Lcor

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Using as a desk in my home office. Nice and sturdy. Looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Buy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful table, looks expensive, and its sturdy. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Eva B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this table! Its exactly what I wanted! Beautiful and just the right size.
customer_reviews.author: julia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So in love with this desk/table! Very modern, great quality. I ordered two for our home office.
customer_reviews.author: VEE

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected!!!
customer_reviews.text: This table is fantastic. Easy set up, beautiful look, cheap price!! Seriously recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Corey

product_meta.title: Flash Furniture 31.5x55 Glass Table, Clear/Espresso
product_meta.description: Color:Clear/EspressoProvide ample space in your dining room to enjoy breakfast, lunch, dinner and even afternoon teas with this wood and glass combination dining table. This contemporary kitchen table features a glass top that sits atop an espresso finish base made of solid beechwood mixing contemporary design with classic comfort while looking incredibly modern and stylish. Floors are protected with floor glides in case of accidental movement or rearrangement. Gather everyone around this chic, rectangular dining table and enjoy great meals.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars142 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
